document.full_text: a u.s. appeals court on thursday overturned a ruling that had found unconstitutional a law that requires the president to proclaim a national day of prayer each year.
document.title: appeals court tosses out prayer day challenge
lines_and_colors: a u.s. appeals court on thursday overturned a ruling that had found unconstitutional a law that requires the president to proclaim a national day of prayer each year.
